Audio.Locality: Boa Nova, Wet Forest, state of Bahia
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Humid forest. Natural calls by a single bird, perched on a hanging branch and sallying for insects. Called after each sally. Other individuals calling in the background.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Chamaeza meruloides,Synallaxis whitneyi,Hemitriccus diops,Contopus cinereus,Saltator fuliginosus
